EmailTemplate.name: Get Help Update Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Help Request {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.CreatedBy} ,
Your additional comments or attachment has been received for your Get Help Request {!Case.CaseNumber}. We will continue to resolve your issue and evaluate how we can prevent this problem from occurring in the future.
Sincerely,
NCR Interact Partner Program Team
